Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • Animal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cat, Dog, Owl

    public abstract class Animal
extends Object
    Basic animal class for COMP1006/1406 tutorial.

    Example abstract class for tutorials in COMP 1006/1406. Students will complete the toString() class (overriding the method inherited from Object) and write subclasses that define the abstract method noise().

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    m. jason hinek

    • Field Detail

      • name

        protected String name
        internal storage of animal's name

        private/protected attributes and methods may or may not have javadoc documentation with them. If the javadoc is the API (interface) for the class, then users of the class should not know about these attributes and methods. It goes against the notion of information hiding if we make them visible like this.

      • birthYear

        protected int birthYear
        internal storage of the animal's birth year
